when programming our robot we want to implement led system , just for testing, we want our led light to stay bright when pressing the a button on Xbox controller, but it does not work. THANKS FOR HELPING

a25d8665a0885dd24c247075614f1921317×825 62.1 KB

93ab4d59fa9d1e8d110b8813accdf001746×185 32 KB

we use another method to solve this but still does not work
image1435×864 73 KB

image1390×870 66.6 KB

image1429×877 105 KB

In the code in the first two pictures, you forgot to call

m_led.setData(m_buffer);

in your loop to flush the led

The code in your third and fourth pictures looks good to me; maybe you should check your wiring. You must be using a 5v WS2812 LED.
Also, if you want to show your code to others in your post, please use markdown grammar to show code

like this

It would be easier to read.
